msContents.summary: The supercommentary on Naḥmanides' (Moshe ben Nahman aka ha-Ramban) commentary on the Pentateuch by Yitsḥaḳ ben Shemu᾿el of Acre.

msItem.title: Sefer meʼirat ʻenayim ספר מאירת עינים

collation.p: Quires of 8 and 9 leaves. No catchwords.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian cursive script, unpunctuated. Yaʿaḳov ben Matatyah Fo᾿ah: inscribed with his name in the colophon, 1552 (folio 123r).

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Black leather. Spine title: 'Isaac of Akko. Meirath Enayim. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Additional 27,172.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Giuseppe Almanzi (b. 1801, d. 1860), Italian bibliophile: his manuscript no. 282; 322 Hebrew manuscripts were acquired from his library in October 1865 through Asher & Co., Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum (see 131-153).
